group_1.textRight: You see...we're out of Grief Seeds,@and the ones I stowed away...

group_1.narration: The ones she kept for emergency use@were nowhere to be found.

group_1.textLeft: I...really did disappear sometimes...@And while I was gone, you...

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I used our Grief Seeds.
There were supposed to still be some left over,@though…
Well, hey, things didn't go accordin' to plan@this time!

group_1.textLeft: You make it sound like it's somebody else's@business...!
Hanna, if you disappear, I...!
...Th-that's it! Let's go hunt a Witch!
As long as you use a Grief Seed,@you'll be healed, right?

group_1.textRight: ...I can't. I don't have enough power@to beat a Witch.

group_1.textLeft: No...

group_1.textRight: ...You knew this was gonna happen@eventually, yeah?
It just came a little sooner than expected...

group_1.textLeft: N-no... You can't become a Witch!

group_1.textRight: Don't be ridiculous...@Ahahaha...
But...you're right...I wanted to hold out@just a little while longer...
I ain't even done with what I wanted to do...
...Say, Sena. You're a fan of heights, right?
When I become a Witch, we'll go to the highest observation deck in the city, and...
...Huh? If I become a Witch,@what happens to you?

group_1.textLeft: My real magic allows me to transplant@my persona...
If I used that to move myself into another@person...

group_1.textRight: ...Transplant magic, huh?@Heh...so you'll be all good, Sena.
...Don't you dare think about going down@with me.

group_1.textLeft: ...So be it. Let's go.

group_1.textRight: Huh...?

group_1.textLeft: I didn't even know I could disappear.
It's just something that happened by itself...
So maybe I've got some other powers@I don't know about.

group_1.textRight: You wanna see if you can beat a Witch...?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...!

group_1.textRight: Fine. If that's what you want, then that's what@we'll do.

group_1.textLeft: Mmmnnnnn...!

group_1.textRight: Wh...what the hell are you doin'?

group_1.textLeft: I'm sending power to you, Hanna!
How's that? Feel any different?

group_1.textRight: Ahaha... I don't feel a thing...
Guhー HOLY SHIT!@I've got all this power all of a sudden!

group_1.textLeft: Really?!

group_1.textRight: Yes, really!@Even I can beat a Witch in this state!

group_1.textLeft: Hooray!

group_1.textRight: Alright, here we go!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah!

group_1.narration: Why are you so bad at lying, Hanna...?
